headline: VICI Properties Announces Pricing of Public Offering of $750 Million of Senior Unsecured Notes
summary: NEW YORK, December 09, 2024--VICI Properties Inc. (NYSE: VICI) ("VICI Properties" or the "Company") announced today that its subsidiary, VICI Properties L.P. (the "Issuer"), has priced a public offering of $750 million in aggregate principal amount of 5.125% senior unsecured notes due 2031 (the "Notes"). The Notes will be issued at 99.643% of par value and will mature on November 15, 2031.

headline: Santa Claus Is Coming To REIT Town
summary: VICI Properties is a top gaming and experiential REIT. Check out top REIT stocks for investors looking for growth, dividends, and solid earnings.
